Articles.Content:
Alex (aLeXmOrA): Added Sketchfab plugin to KSP Forums site and worked on CLASSIFIED INFORMATION

^^ from this week's news post. Methinks this be Multiplayer 'CLASSIFIED INFORMATION' Thoughts as to what this classified stuff is?

Considering Squad stated that multiplayer might be worked on after KSP has been formally been completed, I highly doubt it.

I'd put my money on either mining parts, or more planets.
Since multiplayer with time warp would be next to impossible, ksp is unlikely to have multiplayer in the near future

Since multiplayer with time warp would be next to impossible, ksp is unlikely to have multiplayer in the near future

Not true. You just have to think of it outside the box. I can see a competitive turn based game, either space races or some kind of fighting.

Okay let's not turn this into another multiplayer or not debate. They said if it comes it won't be before 1.0 and it's likely to be a DLC, so I highly doubt it's that.

As for planets, I remember them saying they don't want to add anything new for a while so I'm not convinced it would be that either.

I could be resource mining though

You just need a mechanic where every player needs to aprove timewarp. Then its possible.

More restirictive is I think that you (the player) are the middle of the universe and everything is moving around you.

But never mind.
I heard somewhere that they were planning on integrating the Spaceport into the game or something, so they could be doing that.

I heard somewhere that they were planning on integrating the Spaceport into the game or something, so they could be doing that.

Yes, that's what I think and it would be more logical too.

Yes, that's what I think and it would be more logical too.

Why would they keep it a secret then?

Resource mining makes the most sense IMO.

Why would they keep it a secret then?

So people like you will make threads like these?
Haha I see this turning into a "who can troll the hardest?" thread.
Alex is a web developer. He is probably not working on something related to the core game.
Could it be the implementation of the Kerbalizer to KSP?!?
No, because the Kerbalizer is a separate part, that you have to pay for.
He's coding a thing that will add K to every word on the internet......

He's coding a thing that will add K to every word on the internet......

And nova will go insane
Seeing as Alex is mostly web stuff it's probably something like security or a redone spaceport. You people are too easy to hype.
Considering the security scare last week, most likely a new security implementation.

Seeing as Alex is mostly web stuff it's probably something like security or a redone spaceport. You people are too easy to hype.

And then too annoyed if the hype doesnt become reality...

Webdev? So either spaceport integration (would be nice) or something alone the player achievement tracking that is also implemented...

Considering the security scare last week, most likely a new security implementation.

Security updates are not something you would usually announce in this particular way and nor would it be a secret, and if you where going to, I think it would be kept with it's own updates instead.

Classified huh?

NASA/JPL work on classified stuff.

NASA/JPL scientists have already admitted to playing KSP in their spare time.

Oh my, the conspiracy theorists could go nuts here, I'm sure.

Well, I guess I can tell you what he's working on: Alex is working on a.... ggrrrglll pff jgsdjghh %*(wruwrn

*screams are heard in the background*

Security updates are not something you would usually announce in this particular way and nor would it be a secret, and if you where going to, I think it would be kept with it's own updates instead.

You CAN announce it--you can just place CLASSIFIED INFORMATION to let people know it's not for public consumption, but as a checklist item, it's fine to place it--It's that simple. I mean KSP servers is not exactly the Pentagon or Langley database/archives.
... and I thought the burocrazy (spelled wrong intentionally) around here was bad....

Multiplayer! Aliens! Weapons! Cities! Moar Plernerts!

ERMAGHERD!!!!11!

Edited June 19, 2013 by astropapi1
